sentences.english: The only time its okay to use your fingers is when it's a fish bone.
sentences.chinese: 只有在吃鱼的时候，才可以用手去捏鱼骨头。

sentences.english: The doctor dislodged the fish bone from her throat.
sentences.chinese: 医生取出哽在她喉中的鱼骨头。

sentences.english: One, at dinner, a fish bone stuck my throat, but I did not feel uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 某天，吃晚饭，喉咙卡住了鱼骨头。

sentences.english: Drag onto the page to add a fish frame for cause-and-effect or fishbone diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 拖到绘图页后，可以为因果图或鱼骨图添加鱼骨框架。

sentences.english: Drag onto the page to add a fish frame for cause-and-effect or fishbone diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 拖到绘图页后，可以为因果图或鱼骨图添加鱼骨框架。

sentences.english: Just look at all those fish bones under this tree.
sentences.chinese: 看看这树下所有的鱼骨吧。

sentences.english: You don't spit fishbones when taking fishes.
sentences.chinese: 吃鱼的时候你不吐鱼骨头。

sentences.english: Adds a fish frame for cause-and-effect or fishbone diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 为原因和效果图或鱼骨图添加一个鱼骨框架。

sentences.english: Adds a fish frame for cause-and-effect or fishbone diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 为原因和效果图或鱼骨图添加一个鱼骨框架。

sentences.english: “The fish bones are full of calcium phosphate, ” he said.
I've got a fish bone stuck in my throat.
sentences.chinese: 有根鱼骨头卡在我的喉咙里。

sentences.english: She coughed and choked up a fishbone.
sentences.chinese: 她咳嗽了一下，呕出一根鱼骨头。

sentences.english: He'd begun to fillet. Lizzie was studying the process.
sentences.chinese: 他开始去鱼骨，莉齐则在旁边观看。

sentences.english: Try to cough out the fishbone in your throat.
sentences.chinese: 设法把卡在喉咙里的鱼骨咳出来。

sentences.english: The only time its okay to use your fingers is when it’s a fish bone.
sentences.chinese: 只有鱼骨头才能直接用手去弄。

sentences.english: Even Scott, who is allergic to fish, was boning fish and preparing the dishes.
sentences.chinese: 曾经一向对鱼比较敏感的斯科特也在剔鱼骨做饭。

definition: fish head/fig. upright and unwilling to compromise
fish maw/a food dish made from the swim bladder of fish
pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
